bbcode_desc: This tag displays a little linked image which links back to a post - used when quoting posts from the board. Opens in same window by default.
Aligns content to the right of the posting area
Aligns content to the left of the post
Aligns content to the center of the posting area.
This tag provides an easy way to link to a topic
bbcode_menu_content_text: Enter the title for this link

bbcode_desc: This tag provides an easy way to link to a post.
bbcode_menu_content_text: Enter the title for this link

bbcode_desc: Spoiler tag
bbcode_replace:
Spoiler
{content}
bbcode_menu_content_text: Enter the text to be masked

bbcode_desc: Allows you to make an acronym that will display a description when moused over
bbcode_menu_option_text: Enter the description for this acronym (EG: Laugh Out Loud)

bbcode_desc: Makes text bold
Makes the text italic
Makes the text underlined
Adds a horizontal rule to separate text
Allows you to enter general code
Allows you to enter PHP code into a formatted/highlighted syntax box
Allows you to enter formatted/syntax-highlighted HTML code
Allows you to enter formatted/syntax-highlighted SQL code
bbcode_example: [sql]SELECT p.*, t.* FROM posts p LEFT JOIN topics t ON t.tid=p.topic_id WHERE t.tid=7[/sql]

bbcode_desc: Allows you to enter formatted/syntax-highlighted XML code
A standard HTML url anchor tag
Displays linked images
Displayed quoted text within post content
bbcode_example:
[quote]Some generic content here[/quote]

[quote name='Username' date='Jun 30 2008, 10:39 AM' post='1735291']Quoted post content here[/quote]

bbcode_desc: Indents text a few spaces from the left content border
bbcode_example: [indent=1]Indent this text to make it stand out[/indent]

bbcode_desc: Generate HTML lists.  Supports multi-dimensional lists, and different list marker types.
bbcode_example:
[list][*]Unordered list
[/list]

[list=1][*]Ordered list
[/list]

[list=A][*]Generate different marker types (you can use a, A, i, I, and 1)
[list][*]This is multi-dimensional..
[/list]
[/list]

bbcode_desc: Displays text striked-out
Displays text lowered on the line
bbcode_example: Carbon Dioxide's chemical composition is CO[sub]2[/sub]

bbcode_desc: Displays superscript text
bbcode_example: The mathematical way to write "x squared" is x[sup]2[/sup]

bbcode_desc: Formats an email address as a mailto link
bbcode_example:
Please email [email=admin@mysite.com]the admin[/email]

My email address is [email]my@emailaddress.com[/email]

bbcode_desc: Adds a background color behind the text
Applies a different text-color to the text
Makes text bigger or smaller in font-size
Applies a different font-family to the text
Given a member name, a link is automatically generated to the member's profile
Allows a user to post media content from certain common media sites
A tag to link to a user's twitter account
Allows users to share media throughout IP.Board and addon applications
